title: Audio/video, information and communication technology equipment – Part 1: Safety requirements
scope: HBSE product safety for AV/ICT equipment ≤ 600 V; energy source classification and safeguards.
notes: EU/EN harmonization timelines vary; show OJEU status in UI banner.
UL/CSA 62368-1 is used for NRTL certification in North America.

title: Assessment of EEE related to human exposure restrictions for electromagnetic fields (0 Hz–300 GHz)
scope: Generic EMF assessment for intentional/unintentional radiators where no product-family EMF standard applies.
notes: Provides exposure summation regimes and uncertainty treatment.
